info.title: Persons
info.description: Persons Resource of the University API

get.description: Returns a collection of Persons

parameters.name: credential_type
parameters.description: The type of credential being looked up

parameters.name: user_name
parameters.description: The user name belonging to the credential type

parameters.name: ssn
parameters.description: The person's Social Security Number, no dashes

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.description: The person's PERSONAL email address. A case-insensitive search is performed.  A wildcard character is automatically appended.

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: The person's phone number.  A numerics-only search is performed.

parameters.name: surname
parameters.description: The person's surname.  A case-insensitive search is performed.  You may insert '*' wildcards anywhere in the string, and a wildcard character is automatically appended.

parameters.name: rest_of_name
parameters.description: The person's given names.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: preferred_surname
parameters.description: The person's preferred surname.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: preferred_first_name
parameters.description: The person's preferred first name.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: religion_code
parameters.description: The person's religion, validated through the meta/religion service

parameters.name: citizenship_country_code
parameters.description: The person's citizenship, validated through the meta/country service

parameters.name: home_state_code
parameters.description: The person's home state, validated through the meta/state service

parameters.name: home_country_code
parameters.description: The person's home country code, validated through the meta/country service

parameters.name: visa_type
parameters.description: The person's visa type, validated through the meta/visa_type service

parameters.name: employee_type
parameters.description: The person's employee type in XXX-XX-XXX format. (See the meta/employee_type service)

parameters.name: student_status
parameters.description: The person's student status.  Provided by Student Status Info service

parameters.name: field_sets
parameters.description: indicates which field sets are to be returned

parameters.name: contexts
parameters.description: indicates which contexts are to be returned

200.description: A collection of Persons successfully returned

400.description: Invalid Request - unable to interpret request

409.description: Query parameters conflict or are malformed

parameters.name: person_post
parameters.description: The address values to be set

201.description: A collection of Persons successfully created

207.description: Partial Success - unable to raise event

400.description: Invalid Request - unable to interpret request

409.description: Query parameters conflict or are malformed
